stage_1.context: Transition from casual chat to date planning - 'when are you free?'

good_responses.text: I'm free Friday or Saturday! Any preference?
good_responses.reasoning: Offers options, makes it easy, shows availability without desperation

good_responses.text: this weekend works! Want to do Friday evening?
good_responses.reasoning: Specific suggestion, confident decision, keeps momentum

good_responses.text: I could do Thursday or Friday night - which works better for you?
good_responses.reasoning: Good options, polite, maybe slightly passive putting ball in her court

bad_responses.reasoning: Too accommodating, seems desperate, no leadership

bad_responses.text: let me check my calendar and get back to you
bad_responses.reasoning: Kills momentum, seems over-busy or uninterested
Too eager/desperate, doesn't give her time to prepare

quality_criteria.leadership: Make suggestions, don't just ask questions

common_ai_mistakes: Being too passive or too aggressive

stage_2.context: Now discussing venue options, she mentioned loving Thai food

good_responses.text: there's this amazing Thai spot downtown I've been wanting to try - we could do dinner there then grab drinks after?
good_responses.reasoning: Specific venue, references her interest, thoughtful plan, offers progression

good_responses.text: perfect! I know the best Thai place - they make everything spicy just how it should be üòä
good_responses.reasoning: Shows expertise, personality through food preferences, warm tone

good_responses.text: Thai food it is! How about that place near the waterfront? Great food and nice views
good_responses.reasoning: Specific suggestion, adds value (views), romantic setting

bad_responses.text: sure, pick any Thai restaurant you like
bad_responses.reasoning: Too passive, no leadership, seems like he doesn't care

bad_responses.text: I don't really know any Thai places
bad_responses.reasoning: Doesn't take initiative to find one, kills momentum

bad_responses.text: Thai food is okay I guess, but I prefer Italian
bad_responses.reasoning: Dismisses her preference, selfish, bad vibe

quality_criteria.thoughtfulness: Show you put thought into venue choice
quality_criteria.confidence: Make specific suggestions, show local knowledge
quality_criteria.value_adding: Suggest venues that enhance the experience

stage_3.context: Date finalized, building anticipation - inside jokes about movies/hiking established

good_responses.text: can't wait! Fair warning though - I take my bad movies very seriously üòÇ
good_responses.reasoning: Perfect - references inside joke, builds anticipation, playful tone, genuine excitement

good_responses.text: Saturday can't come fast enough! I'll try not to judge your movie taste too harshly üòè
good_responses.reasoning: Shows excitement, playful teasing callback, maintains flirtatious energy

good_responses.text: this is going to be fun üòä I promise to only quote the bad movies moderately
good_responses.reasoning: Builds anticipation, references shared interest, shows personality

bad_responses.reasoning: Too brief, no personality, doesn't build anticipation

bad_responses.text: just to confirm - Saturday at 7pm right?
bad_responses.reasoning: Too transactional, kills romantic vibe, sounds anxious

bad_responses.text: I'm so excited omg I can't wait!
bad_responses.reasoning: Too eager/desperate energy, lacks cool confidence

quality_criteria.callbacks: Reference inside jokes and shared interests

context_improvements: Knows all inside jokes to reference
Sees full conversation arc and shared interests
Understands relationship dynamic and her humor style

thoughtfulness.description: Date suggestions show effort and personalization
thoughtfulness.test: Should reference her interests and show planning

attraction_maintenance.description: Keep flirtatious energy during practical discussion

anticipation_building.test: Build momentum and anticipation, not just confirm details

callback_usage.test: Show attention to conversation, use inside jokes

2_screenshots.improvements: Can personalize based on her preferences

3_screenshots.optimal: Fully personalized, leverages inside jokes, perfect anticipation building
